long_description: Flexible and forgiving, Ride Mode snowboard boots offer women riders the essentials-comfort, support, chic details and a great price! Built with a women-specific last to fit a woman's unique arch height, forefoot width, calf size and heel and ankle shapes. Zonal speed lacing quickly secures boots with a pull of a handle; handles can be tucked into hand pockets on sides of boots. Plush Body Active EVA liners are warm and comfortable; liners quickly mold to foot shape or can be custom molded for a precise fit. Internal J bars keep heels in place so you have better control of the board. Lock Down(TM) Turbo liner lacing offers a secure, slack-free lacing mechanism that locks laces in place. Durable Grip outsoles offer solid traction on varied surfaces.
short_description: Flexible and forgiving, Ride Mode snowboard boots offer women riders the essentials-comfort, support, chic details and a great price!
